desc: A slice of bike heaven, with some of the most unique and varied bikes and accessories. No matter your cycling persuasion, here you’ll be treated like family. Be sure to drop into Treadly for a chat, get your bike a tune-up, or find your next dream bike! Free loan bikes available at two convenient locations!

layout.text: ADELAIDE’S GO-TO BIKE SHOP FOR EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE, KNOWLEDGEABLE STAFF AND A FOCUS ON COMMUTER, ADVENTURE AND CARGO BIKES AND ACCESSORIES WITH A TOUCH OF SURF GEAR!
